channel.title: Packagings on Feather TS
channel.description: Recent content in Packagings on Feather TS

item.title: Packaging & Deploying
item.description: Packaging You can use browserify, parcel-bundler or any other existing technology to pack and bundle feather applications. Imports Right you can use all feather-ts parts by importing the files directly from NPM: import {Construct} from '@feather-ts/feather-ts/dist/decorators/construct' There will be a commonjs and es6 bundles distribution available too, but we recommend to include only the bits and pieces required for your own app, instead of the full bundled package.
